definition: to receive/to accept/to suffer/subjected to/to bear/to stand/pleasant/(passive marker)

sentences.english: The stage is more beholding to love, than the life of man.
sentences.chinese: 舞台较人生受惠于恋爱者为多。

sentences.english: LUPIT benefited from very high ocean heat content and intensification rate has been fast.
sentences.chinese: 受惠于极高海面热含量，卢碧增强的速度颇快。

sentences.english: Airlines and passengers benefitted from the increased safety and efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 航空公司和乘客受惠于提高安全性和效率。

sentences.english: The people who benefited the most were singles and empty-nesters.
sentences.chinese: 受惠最多的是未婚者和子女不在身边的人。

sentences.english: You can benefit from a strong first impression by simply refacing your kitchen cabinets.
sentences.chinese: 你可以受惠强烈的第一印象只是磨你的厨柜。

sentences.english: The people who benefited the most were singles and empty- nesters .
sentences.chinese: 受惠最多的是未婚者和子女不在身边的人。

sentences.english: Retail sales data will maintain the run of encouraging data with sales boosted by promotions over the holiday season.
sentences.chinese: 受惠于假日促销活动，零售数据将会持续令人鼓舞。

sentences.english: The profit was boosted by the contribution from the newly acquired natural gas business.
sentences.chinese: 纯利上升主要是受惠新收购的燃气业务贡献所致。

sentences.english: In this situation , both you and the homeowner benefit .
sentences.chinese: 在这种情况下，无论你和屋主受惠。

sentences.english: We benefit most from the DX11 Compute features.
sentences.chinese: 我们受惠于DX11的计算大部分功能。

sentences.english: One currency in particular that will benefit is KRW.
sentences.chinese: 其中一种受惠的货币是韩圜。

sentences.english: Only then will she cite the reasons she supports the favored (discriminatory) policy.
sentences.chinese: 只有当她支持其所受惠的政策时她才提及原因。

sentences.english: He strikes, without knowing it, the bosom of the revolution, his benefactress.
sentences.chinese: 他不自觉地打击了使他受惠的革命。

sentences.english: With the current economic calamities, online travel has benefited, he said.
sentences.chinese: 在当前的经济危机下，他认为在线旅游业是受惠者。

sentences.english: It is estimated that more than 280,000 residents will benefit from the implementation of the proposal.
sentences.chinese: 估计超过二十八万名居民会因实施这项建议而受惠。

sentences.english: Indeed, as China prospers, Hong Kong will benefit as well.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，随着中国日趋繁荣，香港亦会受惠。

definition: to shift resources into areas of need/to inject funds/to balance resources
market share/abbr. for 市場佔有率|市场占有率
sum of money raised (in a share subscription)
